I do my laundry once a week, because that is enough to keep my clothes clean and fresh.
my shyness made me panick and i didn t show up.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I am doing well as well, thank you! I am a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat.
I love cats, too! I have two of them. They are my furry companions.
I love having my dog around because he always makes me laugh. What are your favorite things to do with your cats?
I love to cuddle with them and play with them. I also love to take them for walks in the park.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun with them! I once got to see one of my favorite bands in concert. It was an amazing experience!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to concerts, too. I have been to a few concerts this year and they were all great.
What are your favorite bands to listen to?
I love listening to a variety of music, but my favorite bands are The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and The Doors.
Those are all great bands! I love listening to them as well. I am a big fan of classic rock.
Me too! I love the sound of classic rock. It's so timeless.
